snippet.title: Shogun 2: Fall of the Samurai - Campaign Trailer
snippet.description:
The team at Creative Assembly describes the new campaign in the latest version of the Total War game series: "Shogun 2: Fall of the Samurai."

Release Date: March 23, 2012
Exclusively on: PC 
Genre: Strategy 
Publisher: SEGA
Developer: Creative Assembly 

Lead your army over to IGN for more:
http://pc.ign.com/articles/121/1217540p1.html

Subscribe to IGN's channel for reviews, news, and all things gaming: http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=ignentertainment
